prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Pad and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have a Synth Pad and Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of a Synth Pad and Drums, Bass being absent.
